BackstoryDef.title: Mechanical unit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} first awakened on this RimWorld as a fresh intelligence.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mechanical unit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} has only known this RimWorld, and was "born" a member of this society. The future is both uncertain and undecided for {PAWN_nameDef}.
